website_summaries.verdict: These simple reusable bottles are the perfect way to keep your party guests well hydrated.
pros: Pack of 10 reusable water bottles come in a variety of colors
Logo-free design is ideal for adding custom bachelor party labels
A thoughtful gift that can be used again again
cons: Bottles are a little on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable choice for my students
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my classroom the past two years. I love that I found an inexpensive water bottle that is BPA free, large enough to prevent multiple trips to the drinking fountain, and a fairly good quality. Best of all, they do not leak! When looking at water bottles cheap enough for a class of 30, most brands did leak. These ones have held up great. The only downfall is that this year, three students have dropped their water bottles and broken the lids. Last year they survived many falls. Perhaps over a year in a hot classroom has worn out some of the water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful bottles that we use daily with our sports-playing children. We like them so much, in fact, that we have started buying them to give as birthday party favors. The plastic is BPA free so I don't worry about what my kids may be ingesting. The tops screw on tightly and we haven't had any issues with leaking. The squirt top is firm enough when pushed down that the seal keeps water from leaking out of the squirt top also. This is a great water bottle for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle for price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good seal on bottle - I can carry it in my computer bag. Mouth is big enough to add ice cubes. Plastic doesn't seem to stain with juice or flavor additives. Plastic is somewhat brittle, so you can only squeeze so hard. Plastic is also very thin, so contents warm up quickly. Popup nozzle works, but has a tendency to retract after every squirt. Works well for me. I use it as workout water bottle and take one when traveling to fill up after airport security. At $3/bottle, I don't have to worry about losing it or giving it up in the TSA line.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, safe option!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed! As an end of the year gift for my students, I wanted a simple, affordable, BPA-Free water bottle I could customize. These met all of those requirements! I am very pleased with how they're turning out! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: They leak like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute worst thing I have ever bought from Amazon. They leak between the top and the bottom when screwed in. I have tried matching tops and bottoms and marking them. Screwing and unscrewing to get it right and NOTHING works. Don’t buy them!!!! It’s a waste of your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sports Bottles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ( She is an athlete in Junior High ) wanted me to make cute water bottles for some of her friends for Christmas by adding vinyl to them. Her school colors are orange and black, so I thought this dark grey would be perfect. The bottles were much bigger than I thought they would be, which was a major PLUS. They are nice quality and I think all her friends will be really happy with them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for bike rides
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 10 bottles so I could fill them up and put them in the refrigerator so whenever I needed cold water on the go I had some ready. So far they have done great and they fit into the water bottle holder on my bike. Chicks dig dudes with water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for goody bags for my son’s birthday party (we filled them with candy and video game related stuff). The price was great (we needed about 20!) and they are useful. But they are also not super durable, and my addicted-to-bottle-flipping son cracked his within a few flips.
customer_reviews.author: NYMommy10

customer_reviews.title: I bit the bullet & ordered BPA free water bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: I bit the bullet & ordered BPA free water bottles at a higher price as part of a church project. The first day my son dropped his on the floor (which had thin carpet on it) and the spigot broke right off of the top of the lid, so I am not impressed with durability. I haven't heard if any of the other kids water bottles broke yet (we handed out 40 of them), and there's always a chance that it was a fluke. Regardless, for the price I paid, I expected them to be very durable as well as BPA free!
customer_reviews.author: hallie97

customer_reviews.title: Great sports bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! Nice quality. Gave them as favors for my 8 year old's American Ninja Warrior Party. Kids are using them at sports practice now!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my daughter's 13th bday party favor and was pleasantly surprised how excellent quality they were. My daughter and I filled them up to the rim with candy and mini fidget spinners to all her guests. They were a hit and they use them for school and sports.
customer_reviews.author: Yanira Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Price and value are great
customer_reviews.text: These bottles worked well for for our team that I purchased them for. They are not flimsy or cheap like dollar store products. These bottles work great for team sports teams. We personalized ours and the team loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice water bottles with spout. I ordered these for my grandkids. I will put their names on them in vinyl. They seem like a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Knight Family

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price jsut not happy with them not ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for spirit bags and had monogrammed. did not realize until they were all done that the bottles are NOT DISHWASHER SAFE. Great size and price jsut not happy with them not being easily cared for, hard to hand wash since they are narrow and deep.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these.. I gave some of them to my sister. One thing to remember is to carefully threat the cap on. I was filling them quickly from my Brita pitcher and when I took a big swig off of one bottle I got a bath.. ha ha
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value and we used them as birthday party favors for my son's friends at a basketball themed party. They are now all over his school, and seem to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the St.Francis House which is a homeless shelter in St. Augustine. Many of those who use their services only have bikes to ride to and from work. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: sgtchaney

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! People just refilled bottles and we avoided collecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Personalized and used these for a weekend long bachelorette party at the beach! They are awesome! People just refilled bottles and we avoided collecting empties or people drinking 1/2 bottle then opening a new one! Good size , soft enough to squeeze but not flimsy, good size,
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Cindrich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have customized for my sons basketball team. They are great quality for the price, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a dollar store item
customer_reviews.text: The product was pretty cheap looking. I was using these to give out as part of a party favor. I'd probably get them to use for myself...but definitely not to gibe out to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetlass

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bottles at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bottles were much sturdier than I was expecting, based on other reviews. I was very pleased. None of the bottles leaked either. We printed labels and it made a wonderful gift for a HS Choir singing in NYC!
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I get big jugs of soda which are hard to handle. these are just the right side for getting a drink to take with me.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Many of these were dropped by accident and the tops cracked.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are super thin but light and easy to carry. I used these for our volleyball team as gifts and everyone loved them. Easy to customize and the spout makes it easy to store without having to worry about dripping. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I use them to keep martial arts participants ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them to keep martial arts participants hydrated at group practices and competitions. The only drawback is that they can only be squeezed so much at a time. This would not be a problem if being used as personal bottles, but since we share them we try to avoid putting bottles to our mouths, so being able to squeeze and aim is important. On the up hand, they are pretty durable and easy to sanitize, so overall they work well for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful. Lids break easily.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in one piece. I purchased these for 7th graders and on the first day most of the caps were broken. It seemed that if they got dropped they broke. I realize that kids are tough on things but water bottles are usually sturdy enough to withstand a fair amount of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a party favor for my daughter's (Olympics themed) birthday party. I knew from the price that these were going to have a flaw or two, but liked the fact that they are BPA-free. I was disappointed that the spouts are of such poor quality. We could not get them to stay up, making drinking a messy and frustrating undertaking.
customer_reviews.author: KWB

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles that don't give water a plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: Great bottles that don't give water a plastic taste. The top closure is a firm and a little hard to open and close, but is pretty good at not leaking. over all very good. we are repeat buyers so that should speak for itself. very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Fair review

customer_reviews.title: BPA free
customer_reviews.text: Color, cost and BPA free was most import to my small business
customer_reviews.author: Terrie J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These are what they are... cheap water ...
customer_reviews.text: These are what they are... cheap water bottles. I made vinyl decals and applied them to the bottles for my son's basketball team. One boy dropped his while sitting down and the lid broke into 4 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The water bottles were great! They have been fairly durable so far and the girls who attended my daughter's birthday party loved them! I gave them as party favors!

customer_reviews.title: Missing lids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to fill with things as party favors for my sons birthday party. Unfortunately, the evening before the party as I was putting them together, I found that there were only 8 lids instead of 10. My own kids (including the birthday boy) were not able to get a party favor, as there was no time to order more. They seem like nice bottles, but you may not receive all of the parts!

customer_reviews.title: I ended up returning these because I did not need ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these because I did not need them, but the plastic bottle was much thinner than I expected it would be. They can not be washed in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because the lids to the bottles I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the lids to the bottles I had were being destroyed by my son, who likes to chew on them. These are standard-size openings and lids. A bit higher quality (especially the tops) than the cheap thin-walled ones that you sometimes get as swag.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Lids are of a poor quality - easily break
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are fine - however the lids seem to be of an inferior quality. My daughter accidentally dropped two of these bottles by mistake, and the lids broke both the times. If I could, I would return these back.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Bottles are thin plastic, but are exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are thin plastic, but are exactly what I expected for the price. We bought them for our elementary school basketball team, they will last them through the season.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sons basketball team!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my son's basketball team. Maked the team customized water bottles and they loved it. Material is typical plastic water bottles and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I received a lot of compliments on it. I used it for my son sports theme giveaways. I would def order this project again if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Quit badgering me already - here's your review!
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were perfect for my needs - goodie bags for a party. The persistent emails from the company begging for reviews (I received 3) got annoying enough that they worked but made want to knock em down a star... but the product is good ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Great for shirt business
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought them as extras for my shirt business. Very easy to transfer vinyl on to them.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these for my GOTR team, and at ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my GOTR team, and at least half of the lids were broken before the end of the season. I previously purchased the same bottles in purple and did not have a problem with lids breaking.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to make the tball team some personalized items

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sleek look - perfect for party favors.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product -- leaks and not dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash bottle. Lid ok for dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Either hand wash or top shelf, low heat. Otherwise, they shrivel. The lids are fine in dishwasher though! No melting or shrinking.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle, sturdy, easy for kids, don’t break when they drop

customer_reviews.title: Safer plastic and fair price...can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: They're reasonably tough for that price. Had 'em for a long time now and have only had 1 or 2 cases of a leaking nipple or sidewall crack and those were after pretty tough usage.

customer_reviews.title: BPA Free is why i  ordered these

customer_reviews.text: Great water bottles for the price. These work great for kids and are BPA free. They seem to be consistent in quality and seal tight. If you are looking for a bunch of water bottles at a reasonable cost, these are for you.

Very happy with this purchase and very much recommend these bottles.

product_meta.title: Rolling Sands 24 Ounce BPA-Free Plastic Water Bottles, Set of 10, Made in USA
product_meta.description:
With so much concern over cheap plastic drinking bottles that contain BPA (Bisphenol A), these bottles offer a safe alternative. This 24oz Fitness Drink Bottle is BPA-Free, Lead Free, Recyclable and is Made In The U.S.A.

The spill-proof pull top lid makes it a great choice for yoga, exercise class or anywhere, as proper hydration is essential for good health. The 24 ounce semi-rigid bottle is designed to fit both bicycle holders and car cup holders.

The water bottle includes a wide screw top to allow full sized ice cubes to be used. The wide mouth opening also makes it easier to clean. The translucent material allows you to quickly see how full your beverage is. It offers a textured, indented section to allow for easy gripping and carrying. It is very lightweight which is a great benefit when you are trying to keep your load light, whether it is in your hand or on your bike. Sometimes simplicity is best.

The bottles have no logos or advertising preprinted on them. There is a large smooth area to allow for you to customize or personalize the bottles for your sport teams, picnics, birthday party favors, corporate event giveaways and the like. These water bottles are great giveaways for kids and adult events and parties.

We believe you should taste your drink, NOT the plastic bottle. Please hand wash only; not dishwasher safe as the heat can deform the plastic. Studies have shown that “no” plastic items should be cleaned in the dishwasher as strong detergents and high heat will degrade the plastic. 

These great bottles are also available in 3, 30 and 100 packs. Search “Rolling Sands BPA Free 24oz Drink Bottles Made in USA” in the Amazon search box.

 Each bottle measures 8 7/8” H x 2 7/8” W (with lid on); mouth opening is 2 1/8” wide; maximum imprint area measures 4” H x 9 ¼” L (circumference).
feature_bullets: VALUE PACK : Bulk set of 10 semi-rigid lightweight 24 ounce reusable drink bottles
MADE IN USA with BPA-Free PET plastic, Lead-Free, CA Prop 65 compliant, HR4040 and CPSIA Certified
INDOOR OR OUTDOOR: These bulk water bottles are a great choice for: classrooms, cars, gyms, yoga, team sports, gifts, party favors, corporate events, hiking and more
LOGO-FREE BLANK BOTTLES : These blank bottles have no logos so you can add your own design
*EASY TO CLEAN: Wide mouth opening, hand wash only, not dishwasher safe
